title: amysteryremains
author: amysteryremains
created_time: November 22, 2023, 09:00:54 AMLast edit: December 21, 2023, 02:00:34 PM by amysteryremains

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: As you were told in your last PD thread, this is just a hash of existing services - nothing revolutionary.How do you expect to compete with the likes of https://www.masterworks.com/ ?

comments.author: amysteryremains
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 30, 2023, 03:11:23 AMAs you were told in your last PD thread, this is just a hash of existing services - nothing revolutionary.How do you expect to compete with the likes of https://www.masterworks.com/ ?You clearly need to understand the difference between a tokenization platform and an exchange... This is the only exchange being developed right now for Tokenized Assets..Read details about the project before posting mindless comments

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: amysteryremains on November 30, 2023, 02:45:56 PMRead details about the project before posting mindless comments I connected with you per your request.   It is a lot easier for an existing exchange to add NFTs than it is for a rude nobody to build a new one for NFTs.You will need at least partial custody of the assets.   People will need to trust you are not some immature child.

comments.author: amysteryremains
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on December 01, 2023, 12:05:26 AMIt is a lot easier for an existing exchange to add NFTs than it is for a rude nobody to build a new one for NFTs.You will need at least partial custody of the assets.  Existing exchanges won't engage with securities, which is what tokenized assets are. With several tokenization platforms currently emerging, world will need a standardized platform like ASSETX to facilitate the trading of these assets.Additionally, tokenized assets and NFTs (asset-backed NFTs) are entirely distinct concepts. You might want to delve deeper into understanding the differences between them.Quote from: Vod on December 01, 2023, 12:05:26 AMI connected with you per your request.   Please don't. We will let you know when we have an opening for trolls.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: amysteryremains on December 01, 2023, 05:57:14 AMAdditionally, tokenized assets and NFTs (asset-backed NFTs) are entirely distinct concepts. You might want to delve deeper into understanding the differences between them.Distinct concepts that you can treat exactly the same when it comes to a securities exchange, young one.   Wait until you graduate secondary school.  If you see my valid question as trolling, that explains why no one else is interacting with you.

comments.author: amysteryremains
comments.body: I urge this great community to join us in revolutionizing the financial landscape.Engage with us in our initial phase, where your participation not only benefits you but also helps shape the development of a groundbreaking platform, inviting those who can contribute expertise and passion to redefine the future of asset ownership.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: amysteryremains on December 01, 2023, 04:40:41 PMI urge this great community to join us in revolutionizing the financial landscape.Engage with us in our initial phase, where your participation not only benefits you but also helps shape the development of a groundbreaking platform, inviting those who can contribute expertise and passion to redefine the future of asset ownership.You may want to learn beyond the tenets of just business ideas and implementation. If you intend to pursue a project to fruition, you must be open to constructive criticism and not attacking people with words when they state their concerns. Imagine handing your finances to someone rude just because he has a business idea.The last time you walked into a bank and got attneded to sub-substandardly, that bank lost a client, if it continues in that dierection, it seizes to exist. Investors (which you are soliciting for) care more about these than solutions. You might want to revisit the approach of entrepreneurs towards pushing businesses.
